Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Outcome: Application for judicial review allowed; case remitted for re-determination
Grounds_for_Claim: Persecution as Shia Muslims in Pakistan
Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of Refugee Protection Division decision
Evidence_Requirement: Credibility assessment, documentary evidence, country condition information
Government_Body_or_Authority: Refugee Protection Division, Immigration and Refugee Board
Evidence_Type: Credibility findings, cultural sensitivity analysis, documentary evidence, country reports
Governing_Body: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Complaint_Issues: Credibility assessment errors, inadequate state protection analysis, lack of cultural sensitivity
State_Protection_Assessment: Inadequate analysis despite conflicting country condition information
Credibility: Errors in credibility assessment by the Board
Enforcement_Action: Remittal to a differently constituted panel
Perpetrator_Entity: Non-state actors and/or state authorities in Pakistan
